I think I can help you out!

Considering you enjoy buddy movies and are looking for something that might not be too scary, I'd recommend either "Shanghai Knights" (2003) or "Paycheck" (2003). Both films have a light-hearted tone and feature great comedic chemistry between the leads. In "Shanghai Knights", you'll get to see Owen Wilson and Jackie Chan team up for an action-packed adventure in 19th-century London, while "Paycheck" stars Ben Affleck as an engineer who must unravel a complex mystery to clear his name.
